analysis.description:
Reentrancy in EnchantedShop.forwardFunds (/unique_contracts/0x06e4c89135ca81e4f22e2f0e7a27bf0bdb80209c.sol#454-491):
	External calls:
	- supply = object.totalSupply() (/unique_contracts/0x06e4c89135ca81e4f22e2f0e7a27bf0bdb80209c.sol#459-460)
	External calls sending eth:
	- shopSettings.bank.transfer(fee) (/unique_contracts/0x06e4c89135ca81e4f22e2f0e7a27bf0bdb80209c.sol#464)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- shopSettings (/unique_contracts/0x06e4c89135ca81e4f22e2f0e7a27bf0bdb80209c.sol#489)
	- shopSettings (/unique_contracts/0x06e4c89135ca81e4f22e2f0e7a27bf0bdb80209c.sol#489)

EnchantedShop.EnchantedShop (/unique_contracts/0x06e4c89135ca81e4f22e2f0e7a27bf0bdb80209c.sol#435-450) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(_itemReturn == shopSettings.price.div(100))

Reentrancy in EnchantedShop.claimFunds (/unique_contracts/0x06e4c89135ca81e4f22e2f0e7a27bf0bdb80209c.sol#508-558):
	External calls:
	- supply = object.totalSupply() (/unique_contracts/0x06e4c89135ca81e4f22e2f0e7a27bf0bdb80209c.sol#510)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- latestBalanceCheck (/unique_contracts/0x06e4c89135ca81e4f22e2f0e7a27bf0bdb80209c.sol#518-520)

Shop.buyObject (/unique_contracts/0x06e4c89135ca81e4f22e2f0e7a27bf0bdb80209c.sol#358-367) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-object.mint(_beneficiary,numTokens) (/unique_contracts/0x06e4c89135ca81e4f22e2f0e7a27bf0bdb80209c.sol#364-365)
